title: WEACZZY Women's Summer Short Sleeve Casual Dresses V-Neck Floral Party Dress with Pockets
description: 【Material】 This womens dresses is made of soft, stretchy and lightweight material, comfortable to touch and wear. The Floral Print is vibrant but random. The floral print on each dress may be different, but they are definitely made of same pattern fabric
【Features】 Short sleeve dress, wrap v neck, a-line, floral patterned, summer dress with pockets, casual swing dress, floral sundress, knee length dress, empire waist dress

【Occasion】 This cute dress is perfect for leisure, work, home, office, party, wedding guest, cocktail, beach, vacation, appointment, picnic, shopping, travel, school, daily. Good for spring, summer and fall wear

【Match】 The v-neck pattern summer dress is easy to pair with any high heels, earings, necklace and handbags. Feminine and flattering dress. We will try our best to update new floral, you can add to your wishlist for easy search

【Notice】 1. Before order, please carefully read the Size Chart we provided in the pictures, select the size according to it. 2. Machine wash with low temperature water, using mild gentle soap, no bleach.
